text: The women's light heavyweight competition in Judo at the 2015 Summer Universiade in Gwangju was held on 4 July at the Yeomju Bitgoeul Gymnasium. ==Results== ===Gold medal final=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ===Round of 32=== ==Repechage== Category:Judo at the 2015 Summer Universiade Univ
title: Judo at the 2015 Summer Universiade – Women's light heavyweight
